DOC.brief_summary: By use several questionaires , study aim investigation change motivation , symptom , self-esteem coping style adolescent patient anorexia nervosa.. The psychometric property Anorexia Nervosa Stages Change Questionnaire ( ANSOCQ ) relation cop style self-esteem assess . After treatment period nine month , clinical AN diagnosis body mass index ( BMI ) re-assessed . Besides construct validity ANSOCQ , predictive validity term predict outcome AN assess .
DOC.brief_title: Motivation Change , Coping , Self-Esteem Adolescent Anorexia Nervosa
DOC.detailed_description: N=92 adolescent refer eat disorder clinic meeting criterion anorexia nervosa ( AN ) give write informed consent participate study complete ANSOCQ , Eating Disorder Inventory ( EDI-2 ) , Eating Attitudes Test ( EAT ) , Body Image Questionnaire ( BIQ ) , two questionnaire measure Self-Related Cognitions ( SRC ) Coping Across Situations Questionnaire ( CASQ ) . After treatment period nine month , clinical AN diagnosis body mass index ( BMI ) re-assessed . Exploratory factor analysis logistic regression perform .
DOC.criteria: Consecutive cohort patient age 1219 year certify diagnosis anorexia nervosa
